metadata.inclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to include a device to the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to include your device, triple click front Button to include it in the network.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to exclude a device from the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to Exclude your device, triple click front Button to exclude it from the network.
metadata.reset:
1. Exclude the device from Z-Wave network to reset it to factory default.

2. Please use this procedure only in the event that the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
